programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In a hideout near the U.S.-Mexico border, an aging Logan cares for the ailing Professor X. However, their sheltered existence comes to a sudden end when a young mutant girl arrives and needs their help to stay safe. This film is the third Wolverine-based spin-off of the "X-Men" franchise. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Crash landing on a barren penal-colony planet with an unwelcome visitor in tow, Ripley contends with a group of hardened convicts while using nothing but her wits to battle a terrifying new breed of alien. Although her plan to corner and kill the creature just might work, a horrifying discovery reveals that her fight is far from over. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: After a pilot crashes in the harsh terrain of the Gobi Desert, he and his crew try to rebuild the cargo plane and fly it to safety. But, the survivors have to learn to work together before completing such a monumental task. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Girl in the River The Price of Forgiveness
programme.desc: The story of an 18-year-old Pakistani girl who was targeted for death by her family but survived. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Signal
programme.desc: Three students seek a notorious hacker in the Nevada desert, and end up imprisoned in a high-tech government-research facility. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Everything, Everything
programme.desc: A teenage girl is unable to leave her home because she has an immunodeficiency that makes her allergic to almost everything. However, her life changes for the better when she begins to communicate with the boy next door, and their relationship eventually inspires her to venture into the outside world. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: Best Picture winner about an FBI trainee (Best Actress Jodie Foster), who has a knack for analyzing serial killers, and enlists the aid of an imprisoned, cannibalistic sociopath (Best Actor Anthony Hopkins) in tracking a sadistic murderer. An Oscar went to director Jonathan Demme and also Ted Tally won for Best Adapted Screenplay for his script based on the Thomas Harris novel. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Dangerous Son
programme.desc: A profile of three families who are struggling with a child's severe mental illness highlights the cycle of counselor visits, medications, hospitalizations and encounters with law enforcement; and features interviews with mental-health experts and advocates. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley awakens 57 years later in this sequel to 1979's "Alien," returning to the space colony where she first encountered a hideous, reptilian creature. The film won Oscars for Sound and Visual Effects. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: 500 Days of Summer
programme.desc: Greeting-card copywriter Tom falls head over heels for his coworker Summer in this romantic comedy. Tom thinks that he's finally found his soul mate, but Summer claims not to believe in true love and is only interested in having some fun with Tom. The film moves forward and backward through various incidents in Tom and Summer's 500-day love affair. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in 1989 Berlin, MI6 agent Lorraine Broughton must obtain a stolen list of Western spies while the city around her descends into chaos and revolution. In time, her pursuit leads her to uncover a much-larger conspiracy. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: A sleazy drifter gets a job in a Depression-era diner and begins a torrid affair with the owner's much younger wife. The adulterers plot to murder the owner so they can be together. Based on the novel by James M. Cain. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the popular video-game series, a death-row convict relives his ancestor's memories as an assassin in 15th-century Spain. From this out-of-body experience, he gains the training he needs to battle a conspiracy in the present day. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Extreme Ops
programme.desc: Extreme-sports enthusiasts run afoul of a slippery terrorist and his henchmen while filming a commercial in the Austrian Alps. Slick action, absurd plot. Devon Sawa, Rufus Sewell, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In this sequel, Batman and idealistic DA Harvey Dent join forces to arrest and prosecute Gotham City's crime lords. But the deranged Joker raises the stakes by declaring all-out war on the forces of law and order. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Rellik
programme.desc: Following Gabriel's discovery of a crucial piece of evidence, the hunt is on to track down the killer as the truth is finally pieced together. With the net tightening, a thrilling chase of twists and turns ensues, and as Gabriel begins to piece together the trail of violence leading to the killer, he ends up putting everything he holds dear at risk. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Romeo Must Die
programme.desc: Violent take on “Romeo and Juliet” centering on the love affair between a Chinese escaped prisoner (Jet Li) and the daughter of the head of a black crime syndicate. The action packs a punch, but the script is packed with clichés. Pop star Aaliyah (1979-2001) costars and performs four songs on the soundtrack. Isaiah Washington. Andrzej Bartkowiak directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: Adaptation of the graphic novel set in 1985 America, where a cadre of forced-into-retirement superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a wide-ranging conspiracy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the popular video-game series, a death-row convict relives his ancestor's memories as an assassin in 15th-century Spain. From this out-of-body experience, he gains the training he needs to battle a conspiracy in the present day. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Boston cop Thomas Craven discovers his grown daughter Emma led a double life after she is shot to death on his doorstep. Craven investigates her murder and soon uncovers evidence of corporate cover-ups and a government conspiracy. Meanwhile, mysterious government agent Darius Jedburgh sets out to erase all evidence of the crime. (cc).(n)

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: Sam Gerard is back chasing another wrongly accused fugitive. This time he's pursuing Mark Sheridan, a Chicago man framed for a double homicide in New York. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: A genetically mutated scientist's alter ego runs amok in this adaptation of the Marvel comic. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Three student filmmakers are terrorized in the Maryland forest while making a documentary about a legendary 18th-century witch. Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard and Michael Williams star. Directed by Eduardo Sanchez and Daniel Myrick. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Book of Shadows Blair Witch 2
programme.desc: Four fans of the original Blair Witch movie meet with a tour guide and head into the woods in Burkittsville, MD with their own camera equipment to explore the site of the famous murders and decide the extent of its truth and myth. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Forensics expert Alex Cross investigates the disappearance of a senator's daughter, a student at a prestigious private academy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two young boys execute the "perfect" murder, even pinning it on a local crook, but a detective with a disturbed past will not be outsmarted. The boys lie about knowing each other and cover their tracks, but a lack of trust could bring them down. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: The Coen brothers' sly drama about a policewoman (Frances McDormand) who's trying to determine how several murders and a kidnapping are linked to an unassuming car salesman (William H. Macy). Showalter: Steve Buscemi. Grimsrud: Peter Stormare. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Doc Hollywood
programme.desc: A plastic surgeon finishes his residency and heads for a lucrative job in L.A. Distracted, he plows into a fence and is sentenced to community service and fence repair in a small South Carolina town. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore enchants as a Chicago newspaper editor who relives her hellish teen years while on an undercover assignment at a local high school. Barrymore's great, but the film celebrates the fact that her character wins over the same type of “in crowd” that taunted her as a teen. David Arquette costars as her cool brother. Raja Gosnell is the director, and Barrymore served as executive producer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: A precocious, preoccupied 15-year-old develops a crush on a teacher and befriends an eccentric tycoon who falls in love with the same woman. Soon, the prep-schooler and the millionaire do battle in an escalating war of dangerous pranks. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A single woman and a spy race to elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry. Meanwhile, a CIA director attempts to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. Extended edition. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes puts his strength and intellect to the test as he teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a formidable new adversary who is determined to destroy England. (cc).(n)

programme.title: CHIPS
programme.desc: A maverick motorbike racer reeling from a divorce and a California Highway Patrol cop who's secretly an FBI operative must overcome their personality mismatch and work together to uncover a major theft in this big-screen adaptation of the famous TV series from the 1970s and '80s. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore makes her directorial debut with this quirky sports drama about an ex-beauty queen (Ellen Page) who gives up her tiara for roller derby, to the dismay of her mother (Marcia Gay Harden). Kristen Wiig, Juliette Lewis. (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness
programme.desc: A young executive travels to a spa in the Swiss Alps to find and bring home his company's CEO. But when he digs into the truth behind the resort's "miracle cures," the staff diagnose him with the same affliction that has trapped the other guests there. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Wrong Turn 2 Dead End
programme.desc: Contestants in a simulated post-apocalyptic reality show are hunted by an inbred family of hillbilly cannibals. Erica Leerhsen, Henry Rollins, Texas Battle, Aleksa Palladino, Daniella Alonso. Directed by Joe Lynch. (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship. (cc).(n)

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: Adaptation of the British miniseries concerning suspicious events that set a rising congressman and a dogged reporter on a dangerous collision course. A U.S. congressman Stephen Collins is ascending the ladder of power, but his bid for the presidency hits the skids after his research assistant/mistress is viciously murdered. Now top reporter Cal McAffrey is eager to get the truth. But McAffrey has just walked into a major cover-up. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in the year 2018, John Connor leads the human resistance against the computer network Skynet as the machines grow more aggressive than ever before. John was raised to believe in a specific version of the future, but that future begins to shift with the appearance of mysterious former death-row inmate Marcus Wright. As John and Marcus venture into the mechanical heart of Skynet's operations, they make a terrifying discovery about the potential fate of the human race. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: Action flick about an emergency chief and a geologist who scramble to halt the destruction of L.A. from a volcanic eruption. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: A quirky crossword-puzzle constructor falls for a cameraman and follows him across the country in hopes of winning his heart. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A team of incarcerated supervillains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Enchantress, El Diablo and Killer Croc, are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: After his heart transplant, a retired FBI profiler tries to solve the organ donor's murder. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A scientist discovers a catastrophic problem with Earth's core, and he and a team of experts embark on a dangerous mission to the middle of the planet in the hopes of averting a global disaster. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Kevin Costner as an ex-Secret Service agent who falls for the pop diva (Whitney Houston) he's hired to protect. Despite the farfetched premise, the movie was a hit with audiences. The splendid soundtrack includes the hit song "I Will Always Love You." Written by Lawrence Kasdan, who penned the script in 1975 as a vehicle for Steve McQueen. Costner co-produced. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: Thrilling adventure yarn about eight sled dogs struggling to survive when bad weather leaves them marooned at an Antarctic research post. The fact-based film is similar to the 1983 Japanese film "Nankyoku Monogatari," which was released in the U.S. as "Antarctica." (cc).(n)

programme.title: Annabelle Creation
programme.desc: A group of orphaned girls are taken in by a doll maker and his wife, who are still grieving the death of their daughter. However, they are soon terrorized by a haunted doll that's lurking within the couple's house. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue submarine captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to retrieve a missing treasure from the Black Sea, despite the sneaking suspicion that he might end up being double-crossed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, he agrees to help an accounting clerk look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: In 1964 San Francisco, a pre-fame Bruce Lee challenges a Shaolin monk named Wong Jack Man to a fight behind closed doors. This drama depicts this real-life event, which helped cement Lee's reputation as one of the greatest martial artists of all time. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Rellik
programme.desc: Following Gabriel's discovery of a crucial piece of evidence, the hunt is on to track down the killer as the truth is finally pieced together. With the net tightening, a thrilling chase of twists and turns ensues, and as Gabriel begins to piece together the trail of violence leading to the killer, he ends up putting everything he holds dear at risk. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Cooties
programme.desc: An outbreak of cooties turns the students at an elementary school into flesh-eating zombies, trapping the faculty inside the building and forcing them to fight for their survival. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Kevin Costner as an ex-Secret Service agent who falls for the pop diva (Whitney Houston) he's hired to protect. Despite the farfetched premise, the movie was a hit with audiences. programme.title: House of the Dead 2
programme.desc: Emmanuelle Vaugier and Ed Quinn star in this sequel that's based on the gory video game. This time, a secret government agency is called in to deal with zombies that have overrun a college campus. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A female pirate who inherits a galleon searches for buried treasure with the help of a map left by her father. (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Low Down Dirty Shame
programme.desc: PI Andre Shame becomes embroiled in a web of danger while searching for a fortune in missing drug money. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries led by a former CIA operative is hired by the IRA to recover a mysterious briefcase before it's sold to Russian agents. Before long, the assignment turns into a deadly game of cat and mouse. (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: A young boy befriends a wise tree monster while coping with bullying and the terminal illness of his mother. He moves in with his grandmother as his mom's condition deteriorates, and uses his imagination and friendship with the monster to escape reality. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: A genetically mutated scientist's alter ego runs amok in this adaptation of the Marvel comic. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Sugar Hill
programme.desc: A high-ranking Harlem drug dealer decides to quit the business and start over in North Carolina with his girlfriend. However, his disapproving brother, having worked alongside him every step of the way, won't let him get out that easily. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: A struggling actor and crook moves to Los Angeles, hoping to score some movie roles, where he meets a gay PI at a party. When a series of female bodies turn up, they find themselves investigating the murders. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Trouble with Spies
programme.desc: An inept secret agent searches for his missing colleague in Ibiza. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Away We Go
programme.desc: A thirtysomething couple (John Krasinski and Maya Rudolph) expecting their first child set off on a cross-country search for the perfect place to live. After learning that his parents are moving to Europe, the duo realize that they can lay down roots anywhere. They visit a number of old friends in different cities and learn valuable lessons about parenting. Directed by Sam Mendes. Maggie Gyllenhaal, Allison Janney, Jeff Daniels. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore enchants as a Chicago newspaper editor who relives her hellish teen years while on an undercover assignment at a local high school. Barrymore's great, but the film celebrates the fact that her character wins over the same type of “in crowd” that taunted her as a teen. David Arquette costars as her cool brother. Raja Gosnell is the director, and Barrymore served as executive producer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: A grizzled older cop is removed from a car theft case and partnered with a younger detective, but that doesn't stop him from interfering with the investigation, leaving his new partner stuck in between doing what's right and doing his job. (cc).(n)

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: A quirky crossword-puzzle constructor falls for a cameraman and follows him across the country in hopes of winning his heart. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Reno 911! Miami
programme.desc: The TV cops from Nevada travel to Florida for a police convention that is attacked by bioterrorists. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Neighbors 2 Sorority Rising
programme.desc: Young parents Mac and Kelly find that their neighbor troubles are far from over when a hedonistic sorority moves in next door just as they're about to sell their house. During their feud with the ladies, the couple team up with ex-fratboy Teddy, who tormented them the last time around. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: A struggling actor and crook moves to Los Angeles, hoping to score some movie roles, where he meets a gay PI at a party. When a series of female bodies turn up, they find themselves investigating the murders. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Orange County
programme.desc: With the help of his stoner brother, a California scholar seeks an alternate route to Stanford when the usual college-admissions process doesn't work. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dave
programme.desc: An employment-agency owner is enlisted to impersonate the President to avoid a scandal when an extramarital dalliance leads to a mishap that puts the commander in chief in a coma. (cc).(n)

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A lonely time traveler meets the love of his life, and attempts to win her heart time and again after a glitch in the process renders them complete strangers. Later, he repeatedly travels back to his past in order to perfect his present. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: Three female African-American mathematicians provide crucial calculations for NASA's space race against the Soviets, all while dealing with the racist and sexist assumptions of their white co-workers. (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: A young boy befriends a wise tree monster while coping with bullying and the terminal illness of his mother. He moves in with his grandmother as his mom's condition deteriorates, and uses his imagination and friendship with the monster to escape reality. (cc).(n)

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: A self-centered ad exec (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to read women's minds---much to his chagrin. Clever premise, but the one-note joke wears thin. Helen Hunt. Directed by Nancy Meyers ("Something's Gotta Give"). Bette Midler has a cameo. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are discovered. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch (Wood Harris) have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita attempt to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs back. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Crooklyn
programme.desc: Portrait of a close-knit black family living in 1970s Brooklyn, as seen through the eyes of the youngest daughter. This comedy-drama follows them as they deal with money woes, eccentric neighbors and the sons' troublemaking. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Rocket Science
programme.desc: Rewarding coming-of-age saga of a stuttering teen (Reece Daniel Thompson) who joins his high-school debate squad and falls in love with a female teammate (Anna Kendrick). Written and directed by Jeffrey Blitz. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Amelia
programme.desc: This biopic spans the life of aviator extraordinaire Amelia Earhart (Hilary Swank), whose famous voyage across the Atlantic was tragically overshadowed by her mysterious disappearance five years later. Richard Gere, Ewan McGregor. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: A New York adman deals with the pain of losing a child by writing letters to Time, Death and Love. He is soon visited by representations of the three concepts, and they, along with his close friends, help him return to some semblance of a normal life. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Piano-playing brothers, one a prodigy, the other mediocre, meet a chanteuse who livens up their act but whose affair with one may break them up. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When their annual vacation getaway falls through, a happily unmarried couple are forced to spend Christmas with the families of their four divorced parents on the same day. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: A clan's estranged patriarch loses his home and learns that his ex-wife plans to remarry, so he pretends to be dying to win back his family. Although his ex lets him move back in, his three adult children don't react well to their father's return. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars as Davy Crockett and Dennis Quaid is Sam Houston in this somber re-creation of the famous 1836 siege in San Antonio. Historically accurate, but unexciting. Jason Patric, Patrick Wilson. Directed by John Lee Hancock (“The Rookie”). (cc).(n)

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: Adaptation of the graphic novel set in 1985 America, where a cadre of forced-into-retirement superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a wide-ranging conspiracy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple discover that their hospitable new neighbors are actually government spies. Soon, all four of them are caught up in an international espionage imbroglio. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A single woman and a spy race to elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry. Meanwhile, a CIA director attempts to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. Extended edition. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: A singer's life is sent into upheaval after being left at the altar, leaving him to try and put the pieces back together with a waitress. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: After witnessing her gangster boyfriend commit a murder, lounge singer Deloris evades capture and the police hide her in a convent. While adjusting to her new conditions, Deloris helps transform the choir, thus attracting a lot of attention. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Kids provide for themselves during summer vacation after their babysitter dies. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Rabbit Hole
programme.desc: Becca (Nicole Kidman) and her husband Howie (Aaron Eckhart) mourn the death of their 4-year-old son, who was hit by a car while chasing the family dog into the street. The couple attend group therapy, where Howie befriends another woman. Meanwhile, Becca forms a tentative friendship with the teenager who accidentally killed her son. Directed by John Cameron Mitchell. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy
programme.desc: A Southern matron forges a bond with her black chauffeur in the racially-divided 1960s South. Only when he is retired and she is confined to a home for the elderly do the two fully realize that they've been friends and kindred spirits all along. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Forensics expert Alex Cross investigates the disappearance of a senator's daughter, a student at a prestigious private academy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Congo

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

programme.desc: Gorąca lista przebojów. Twórcy przedstawiają widzom ich ulubione, najsłynniejsze hity.(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)
